articles.description: MARTIN KEOWN: It feels as if Arsenal are trying to recreate that now under Mikel Arteta - and it has ignited a new-found belief among the squad and the fans, uniting a club that's rebuilding its reputation.
articles.content:
Not since Arsene Wenger's defending champions in 2004-05 has an Arsenal side started a season with five straight wins.
Back then, the Gunners would go into games with a plan to start strong, score e… [+4317 chars]
